basics.name: Mariah Justine Gaoiran
basics.label: Student
basics.summary: I am pursuing a B.S. in Computer Science in the Department of Information and Computer Sciences at the University of Hawaii. I expect to graduate in Spring, 2019.

work.summary: Assists in computer and networking needs for the SOEST network at UH Manoa
highlights: Manage servers and switches in the closets and data centers of SOEST
Create and manage accounts to access the SOEST network
Set up or reinstall systems and necessary software

volunteer.organization: For Inspiration and Recognition of Science and Technology (FIRST)
highlights: Scheduling teams to fill in for other non-present ones

volunteer.summary: Mentoring K-8 in STEM during a week long summer camp
highlights: Teaching students to build and program various robots
Creating and facilitating activities to encourage problem-solving
Acting as the Master of Ceremonies for an exhibition tournament

awards.title: Dean's List
awards.awarder: UH Manoa College of Natural Sciences
awards.summary: Award for achieving above a 3.5 GPA with a class load of over 12 credits.

awards.title: Departmental Merit Scholarship
awards.summary: Scholarship for playing cello in UH Symphony Orchestra.
